DOC.brief_title: Relationship Brain Natriuretic Peptide ( BNP ) Levels Cardiac Diagnosis , Operation Performed , Post-operative Course Outcome
DOC.detailed_description: Three type natriuretic peptide ( NP ) isolate : atrial natriuretic peptide ( ANP ) , brain natriuretic peptide ( BNP ) , C-type natriuretic peptide ( CNP ) . The NP family elicit number vascular , renal endocrine effect help maintain blood pressure extracellular fluid volume . These effect mediate specific bind NP cell surface receptor characterize , purify cloned cell vasculature , kidney , adrenal gland brain . There 3 subtypes NP receptor : type A natriuretic peptide receptor ( NPRA ) , type B natriuretic peptide receptor ( NPRB ) , type C natriuretic peptide receptor ( NPRC ) . All 3 subtypes affect cellular second messenger activity . The literature currently define level b-type natriuretic peptide ( BNP ) child congenital heart disease undergoing surgery . The investigator wish perform retrospective chart review define BNP level pediatric cardiac defect population evaluate relationship level cardiac diagnosis , operation perform , post-operative course outcome . The investigator collect follow information medical record : - Laboratory : BNP level , serum pH , lactic acid , Co-ox , CBC , Chemistry - Diagnosis - Surgical Procedure - Incidence re-operation - Length ICU Stay - Length Hospital Stay - Complications - Length Ventilation ( many day ventilator ) - Medications - Cross Clamp Time - Bypass Time - Echocardiogram data - Cardiac Catheterization Data - Vital Signs - Monitored Hemodynamic Measures - Final outcome ( discharge death )
DOC.criteria: Congenital heart defect Patients without congenital heart defect
